name: Saga of Seasons (Prototype 1.0)
description:
Welcome to Yurisen's first prototype for the Saga of Seasons!

Join Summer on her quest to collect the gravity that is running out on Earth.

For more info on the story and levels to come follow fb.com/OfficialYurisen or Twitter @OfficialYurisen to follow any updates!

Thank you in advance for playing and giving any feedback! :)

(It's not perfect but we're working on it!)
